ygData.subject: soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all When I play EQ I allways get asked to play the Jig to increase mana regeneration. I was asked this for 4 times today and I really hate it. I even got
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all

When I play EQ I allways get asked to play the Jig to increase mana
regeneration. I was asked this for 4 times today and I really hate it. I
even got kicked from a group when I refused to play it because the mana is
not regenerating faster. Can anyone recommend me what to do?
I have one more problem. I'm lvl 15 at the moment and I can hardly ever solo
a blue creature. I'm wearing full banded armor, and I have my 1H slash
allways maxed. I'm using tentacle whip as a weapon, no it's not twinked I
got it as in a bet when someone didn't beleive me that selo's is faster than
sow. And I just bought the armor. Can anyone please tell me why can't I solo
a blue creature without loosing 90-95% of my health.

Asandir
